usage: <player> setDepthOfField(<near start>, <near end>, <far start>, <far end>, <near blur>, <far blur>)
description: Set the depth of field values for a player. If start >= end for near or far, depth of field is disabled for that region.

params.name: near start
description: Before this distance, near depth of field is maximally blurry.

params.name: near end
description: After this distance, near depth of field is perfectly in focus.

params.name: far start
description: Before this distance, far depth of field is perfectly in focus.

params.name: far end
description: After this distance, far depth of field is maximally blurry.

params.name: near blur
description: Maximal blur radius for near depth of field, in pixels at 640x480.

params.name: far blur
description: Maximal blur radius for far depth of field, in pixels at 640x480.
